name: Helheim (itch) (Quesillo Studios)
description:
Among the arduous battles that the world of mud and sweat must to face off, our warrior has fall into the torment of not knowing how he got in here, a lost soul, a floating particle between lost in all his memories. That limbo known as Hellheim has took his mind and frozen time lapse between real life and fleeting life.

This actual game is the GGJ 2021 version, and we will work on an updated version.

[Helheim on GGJ page]

PD: for a while the game is only on Spanish lang. English translate is on WIP.
